articles.title: Kim Jong Un Gives Field Guidance to October 8 Factory
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Gives Field Guidance to October 8 Factory
 Pyongyang, August 31 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, provided field guidance to the October 8 Factory built as an icon and standard of the DPRK's industrial establishments.
					 Enjoying a bird's eye view of the factory, he expressed great satisfaction, saying he could hardly find any trace he saw last year, it did not look like a factory but a rest home as it turned into a thick woodland and greenery and park and the culture of workers was in full bloom in all its  worksites.
					
					 He went round a monument to the revolutionary activities of the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu, hall of culture, e-library, cutting shop, finishing shop, products show room, gymnasium, Unjong health complex, canteen, rest home, workers' hostel and various other places of the factory to learn in detail about the construction and production there.
					
					 He said that it was his intention to turn the October 8 Factory into a factory representing the nation's industrial establishments, a factory meeting the requirements of the age of knowledge-based economy and befitting the appearance of highly civilized socialist country and the one to be proud of in the world. Its builders successfully carried out the plan of the Central Committee of the WPK, he added.
					
					 He said that the factory has perfect computer-aided integrated production system, is equipped with latest facilities and fitted with cooling and heating system depending on geothermal power, thereby  emerging an industrial establishment put on an IT and digital basis and becoming an energy-saving one.
					
					 He set forth the tasks to be implemented by the factory. 
					
					 He noted with pride that the construction of the factory proved once again that with the might of great unity of army and people they can do anything in the world.
					
					 He sent thanks to soldier-builders of Large Combined Unit 593, Unit 101, Unit 489 and Unit 462 of the KPA and people who performed labor feats in the construction of the factory and personally proposed awarding high state citations to those of merit. 
					
					 He had a photo session with officials and employees of the factory. 
					
					 He was accompanied by Hwang Pyong So, Han Kwang Sang, Hong Yong Chil and Kim Jong Gwan.

articles.title: British Plan for Producing Anti-DPRK Movie under Fire
articles.content:
British Plan for Producing Anti-DPRK Movie under Fire
 Pyongyang, August 31 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Policy Department of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK issued the following statement on Sunday:
					 Recently the British 4th TV channel producers openly made public a plan for producing and airing a serial TV drama-style movie malignantly slandering the DPRK.
					
					 The movie is nothing but a conspiratorial charade painting a wrong picture of the DPRK's reality as it is based on a sheer lie intended to give impression that the DPRK's nuclear treasured sword for self-defence was manufactured by "illegally acquiring" nuclear technology from Britain. 
					
					 The broadcasting service is blustering without hesitation that the purpose of the movie is to tell the world that the DPRK is the "most closed country on the earth" and the "biggest threat" to the Western world.
					
					 No matter how desperately the producers of the above-said TV channel, hooligans and rogues under the guise of artistes, may work to falsify the reality, they can never hide the truth.
					
					 The DPRK's nuclear treasured sword for self-defence is the proud fruition of the defense industry in the era of Songun based on its own efforts, technology and resources from A to Z.
					
					 The Juche-oriented nuclear power of the DPRK which is on the ultra-modern world level is so powerful and tremendous that no one can imagine.
					
					 The U.S., a master hand at plots and fabrications, dares not deny this hard fact.
					
					 Those who are talking about "illegal acquisition of nuclear technology" are no more than blind fools and idiots bereft of even elementary ability to discern the truth.
					
					 The gravity of the situation lies in that this despicable burlesque is being orchestrated at the tacit connivance, patronage and instigation by "Downing Street".
					
					 This mud-slinging is a premeditated politically-motivated provocation and deliberate hostile act to hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership and tarnish the sovereign authority of the DPRK and its international image.
					
					 It is not exaggeration to say that Britain is the country with inborn disposition of blindly copying the American-style diplomacy.
					
					 This is evidenced by the fact that when a movie company of Hollywood distributed a preview of a reactionary movie peppered with the story hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK after producing it, the British broadcasting service deliberately used it for staging such charade.
					
					 The British authorities should not forget even a moment the lesson drawn from the incident in which that it was sentenced to permanent death because of "poems of evil" which groundlessly slandered a country in the Mideast in the past.
					
					 Reckless anti-DPRK hysteria would only bring disgrace and self-destruction.
					
					 The British authorities should throw reactionary movies now being planned or in the process of production into a dumping ground without delay and punish the chief culprits. 
					
					 This would help prevent any hurt to the image of the UK and preserve the hard-won diplomatic relations between the DPRK and Britain.
					
					 It would be well advised to judge itself what consequences would be entailed if it ignores the DPRK's warning.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Malaysian King
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Malaysian King
 Pyongyang, August 31 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, on Sunday sent a message of greeting to King Al－Sultan Almutasimu Billahi Muhibbudin Tuanku Alhaj Abdul Halim Muadzam Shah Ibni Al－Marhum Sultan Badlishah of Malaysia on its national day.
					 Kim Yong Nam expressed the belief that the relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would grow stronger in the common interests, wishing the Malaysian people progress and prosperity.

articles.title: Pak Pong Ju Greets Malaysian PM
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju Greets Malaysian PM
 Pyongyang, August 31 (KCNA) -- Premier Pak Pong Ju on Sunday sent a message of greeting to Prime Minister Datuk Seri Mohamad Najib Bin Tun Haji Abudul Razak of Malaysia on its national day.
					 The message expressed the belief that the bilateral relations of friendship and cooperation would grow stronger in the common interests and in line with the desire of the peoples, wishing the prime minister success in the work for the stability and development of Malaysia. 
					
					 Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong sent a similar message to his Malaysian counterpart on the same day.

articles.title: Ri Su Yong Greets FM of Nicaragua
articles.content:
Ri Su Yong Greets FM of Nicaragua
 Pyongyang, August 31 (KCNA) -- Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong sent a message of greeting to his Nicaraguan counterpart Samuel Santos Lopez on Aug. 21 on the occasion of the 35th anniversary of diplomatic ties between the DPRK and the Republic of Nicaragua.
					 The message expressed the belief that the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation would continue to develop favorably in various fields.
					
					 It wished the government and people of Nicaragua great success in the struggle against imperialism and in the endeavors for building a thriving society under the leadership of President Daniel Ortega Saavedra.

articles.title: First-Day Pyongyang International Pro-Wrestling Games Held
articles.content:
First-Day Games of Pyongyang International Pro-Wrestling Contest Held
 Pyongyang, August 31 (KCNA) -- The first-day games of the Pyongyang International Pro-Wrestling Contest took place at the Ryugyong Jong Ju Yong Gymnasium Saturday.
					 Well-known pro-wrestlers took part in the contest. They will compete in men's single and double games and women's doubles.
					
					 People, youth and students in the city, sports fans, overseas compatriots and foreigners watched the games.
					
					 The wrestlers showed dynamic games while combining their explosive strength with special skills.
					
					 During a break, there took place a demonstration of the DPRK Taekwon-Do players and the Japanese martial arts players.
					
					 The results of the first-day games of the contest are as follows:
					
					 Winners: losers in men's singles
					
					 Crusher Kawaguchi (Japan): Daichi Hashimoto (Japan)
					
					 Wang Bin (China): Keisuke Okuda (Japan) 
					
					 Ultimo Dragon (Japan): Hajime Ohara (Japan)
					
					 Montanha Silva (Brazil): Taka Kunoh (Japan)
					
					 Jerome Le Banner (France): Shinichi Suzukawa (Japan)
					
					 Kazuyuki Fujita (Japan): Erik Hammer (U.S.) 
						
					
					 Winner: Loser in men's doubles
					
					 Bob Sapp, Jon Andersen (U.S.): Atsushi Sawada, Shogun Okamoto (Japan)
						
					
					 Winner: Loser in women's doubles
					
					  Ray, Kyoko Kimura (Japan): Meiko Satomura, Dash Chisako (Japan)
					
					The contest goes on.

articles.title: Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, August 31 (KCNA) -- Kanji Inoki, member of the House of Councilors of Japan who is also chief director of the Sports Peace Community Association of Japan and co-chairman of the organizing committee of the Pyongyang International Pro-Wrestling Games, and his party and foreign players visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun on Sunday.
					 They paid high tribute to the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in boundless reverence for them who are alive in the hearts of all the people as the sun for their immortal contributions to the development of friendly relations among countries and global cause of independence.
					
					 At the halls where Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il lie in state they paid homage to them.
					
					 They went round the halls where orders the Generalissimos received are on display and the halls that house cars, an electric car, a boat and train coaches used by them during their field guidance and foreign trips until the last moments of their lives.
					
					 The guests made entries in the visitor's book.

articles.title: Japanese Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Japanese Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
 Pyongyang, August 31 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Fukuoka Prefectural Japan-DPRK Friendship Association led by Chairman Mamoru Kitahara visited Mangyongdae, birthplace of President Kim Il Sung.
					 They looked round the relics at the old home, being briefed on the revolutionary history of Kim Il Sung and family members of Mangyongdae.
					
					 At the end of the visit the head of the delegation said that Mangyongdae is the significant place where the Korean revolution originated, adding that the Japanese people have to know the revolutionary feats of Kim Il Sung.
					
					 The guests also toured the Tower of the Juche Idea, Munsu Water Park and Okryu Children's Hospital.

articles.title: DPRK's Tactical Rocket Firing Is Undebatable: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
DPRK's Tactical Rocket Firing Is Undebatable: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, August 31 (KCNA) -- The U.S. is fidgety over the drill of firing tactical rockets regularly conducted by the DPRK. Riff-raffs call the DPRK's regular firing of the tactical rockets a low-profile provocation to weaken the reaction of the international community.
					 Rodong Sinmun on Sunday observes in a commentary that rocket firing can never be taken up for argument, stressing it is a legitimate right of a sovereign country to exercise the right to self-defence.
					
					 The provocateur is none other than the U.S. as it shipped nuclear hardware into the Korean peninsula, pushing the situation to the worst phase with war drills, the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					 The U.S. insistence that the DPRK's rocket firing is a provocation is prompted by its intention to escalate joint military exercises over the latter's exercise of right to self-defence and deteriorate the situation in the peninsula and its vicinity and thus realize the ambition for invading the DPRK.
					
					 Herein lies the reason that the U.S. violently stirs up the confrontation racket over the DPRK's rocket firing that has nothing to do with it.
					
					 Nobody will be taken in by the U.S. tricks, however, as it tries hard to legalize the nuclear arms buildup by shifting the responsibility for the provocation on to the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. should know that with no despicable counter-propaganda can it cover up its nature as aggressor and provocateur.
					
					 The DPRK will take stronger military countermeasures to cope with the joint military exercises for aggression conducted by the U.S. under the veil of "annual and defensive ones".

articles.title: Introduction of U.S. Fighters Assailed in S. Korea
articles.content:
Introduction of U.S. Fighters Assailed in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, August 31 (KCNA) -- The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification in south Korea held a meeting for peace and disarmament outside the building of the puppet Defense Ministry on August 29 denouncing the military authorities for moving to introduce U.S. fighters.
					 F-35 fighter which the military authorities mull introducing has been blamed for more than 700 confirmed performance errors and security issues over the past decade, the organization said.
					
					 It accused the Defense Ministry of working hard to introduce it under the pretext of "concern over the gap of force", a serious threat to peace on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 The military authorities are also covering up or downplaying the case of the interference in the "presidential" election and the death of a private first class, it noted, demanding Kim Kwan Jin resign at an early date as he is chiefly to blame for the cases.

articles.title: General Strike Declared in S. Korea
articles.content:
General Strike Declared in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, August 31 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions (KCTU) held a rally at Kwanghwamun plaza in Seoul on August 28 at which it declared that it would enter the general strike in demand of the institution of a special law for the probe into the truth about ferry Sewol disaster, according to KBS of south Korea.
					 At the rally Sin Sung Chol, chairman of the KCTU, said that they would turn out in the struggle to build a world where people's security and lives are ensured.
					
					 The purpose of the struggle is to institute a special law granting the right to indict and prosecute those responsible for the disaster as demanded by the bereaved families of victims of the disaster.
					
					 At the end of the rally the representatives of the KCTU visited the venue of the sit-in being staged by the bereaved families, and encouraged them.

articles.title: Day of Songun Celebrated Abroad
articles.content:
Day of Songun Celebrated Abroad 
 Pyongyang, August 31 (KCNA) -- Meetings, seminars, photo and book exhibitions, film shows and reading sessions took place from August 21 to 23 in Romania, India, Peru and Angola to mark the Day of Songun in the DPRK. 
					 On display at the venues were photos documenting undying exploits of leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un. There were also photos and books introducing Songun Korea. 
					
					 Films shown included the Korean film "Arms of Korea". 
					
					 The chairman of the Romanian Workers' Association said August 25 is a significant day when eternal General Secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea Kim Jong Il started the Songun revolutionary leadership. 
					
					 He went on:
					
					 H.E. Kim Jong Il increased the capabilities of the people's army and firmly defended the country and victoriously led the socialist construction in reliance on the army in the whole course of his Songun revolutionary leadership. 
					
					 We believe that the Korean people will always emerge victorious in the standoff with the imperialists as they uphold the great banner of Songun under the wise leadership of H.E. Kim Jong Un who is carrying forward the idea and cause of the preceding leaders. 
					
					 The chairman of the Indian Society for the Study of Works of Kim Jong Il said that the powerful nuclear deterrence of the DPRK would be unthinkable without the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 The chairman of the Peru-Korea Friendship Institute for the Study of the Juche Based Songun Policy said the vitality of the Songun policy pursued by Kim Jong Il has been clearly proved in all fields including military affairs, economic construction and the work for improving people's living standard. 
					
					 Angolan personages said the future of the DPRK is rosy thanks to Kim Jong Un who is successfully carrying forward the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Suk Pyongyang Textile Mill Introduced in Nigeria
articles.content:
Kim Jong Suk Pyongyang Textile Mill Introduced in Nigeria 
 Pyongyang, August 31 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism posted on its internet website an article titled "Kim Jong Suk Pyongyang Textile Mill" on August 22. 
					 Noting that Kim Jong Suk Pyongyang Textile Mill sits on the bank of River Taedong in Pyongyang, the article went on:
					
					 Anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk together with President Kim Il Sung visited the mill on October 10, 1948. She said the place of the factory chosen by the President was good and her life-long wishes would be realized when a large textile mill was built to provide people who lived hard life in rags with good clothes. 
					
					 Her noble wishes were realized thanks to the wise leadership of the President and Chairman of the National Defence Commission Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The textile mill has turned into a large general textile mill which is equipped with modern facilities as required by the IT era and capable of producing diverse kinds of quality cloths. 
					
					 Supreme leader Kim Jong Un visited the mill in October of 2013 and said that it is the intention of the Workers' Party of Korea to fit the mill with high-speed equipment and modernize the production processes at a high level to produce quality cloths of various kinds. 
					
					 He made sure that a new workers' hostel was built to provide the workers of the mill with excellent living conditions as befitting a highly civilized socialist country. 
					
					 The workers' hostel of the mill was thus built in a short span of time. It has bedrooms, a bathroom, beauty salon, shop, clinic, library and other service facilities and even a park where the hostellers may rest and enjoy amusement games and sports games freely.
					
					 A banquet for workers was splendidly given at the hostel to celebrate May Day. 
					
					 The workers of the textile mill are making fresh innovations in cloth production in high spirit to bring into reality the noble wishes of Kim Jong Suk.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Off Press in Ethiopia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Off Press in Ethiopia
 Pyongyang, August 31 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us March Forward Dynamically towards Final Victory, Holding Higher the Banner of Songun" was brought out in booklet by the Penguin Publishing House of Ethiopia on August 22.
					 The work, a speech made by Kim Jong Un at the military parade to celebrate the 100th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung on April 15, Juche 101 (2012), says the 100 year-long history of Kim Il Sung's nation clearly proves the immutable truth that outstanding leaders assure the dignity and prosperity of the country and the nation.
					
					 It sets forth the tasks to be fulfilled to glorify the dignity of Songun Korea for all ages and successfully carry out the cause of building a thriving socialist nation.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un dirige Fabrica 8 de Octubre
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un dirige Fabrica 8 de Octubre
Pyongyang, 31 de agosto (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio en el terreno la Fabrica 8 de Octubre, construida como un ejemplo y modelo de las instalaciones industriales del pais.
					Al contemplar el panorama de la fabrica se mostro muy satisfecho diciendo que no puede hallar ningun viejo aspecto del ano pasado en cualquier lugar, la fabrica parece a una casa de reposo donde se ha realizado la reforestacion y la transformacion en parque y es un taller de trabajo en que florece plenamente la cultura de la clase obrera.
					
					Hizo detallado conocimiento del estado de construccion y produccion recorriendo la lapida a las actividades historico-revolucionarias de los grandes Hombres sin pares del monte Paektu, la casa cultural, la biblioteca electronica, los talleres de corte y acabado, la sala de exhibicion de articulos, el gimnasio, el complejo de servicios de higiene Unjong, el comedor, la casa de cura y descanso, el albergue y otros lugares.
					
					Subrayo que los constructores materializaron estrictamente un proyecto del CC del partido de convertir la fabrica en una planta digna de representar las instalaciones industriales de nuestro pais, en una empresa simetrica a la epoca de economia basada en intelectualidad y al estado civilizado socialista.
					
					Como resultado de que la fabrica establecio perfectamente el sistema combinado de produccion por computadora, esta equipada de las instalaciones ultramodernas y aplico el sistema de calefaccion y enfriamiento con la geotermia, la empresa se ha convertido en la informatizada, digitalizada y ahorradora, senalo el Mariscal y presento las tareas que se presentan ante la fabrica.
					
					Dijo con orgullo que a traves de la construccion de la fabrica quedo comprobado una vez mas que con el poderio de la gran unidad entre el ejercito y el pueblo, no hay nada inalcanzable en el mundo.
					
					Dio agradecimiento a los constructores militares de la gran unidad combinada 593 y las unidades 101, 489 y 462, del EPC y a los habitantes y propuso otorgar a los benemeritos la condecoracion estatal.
					
					Luego, se fotografio con los funcionarios y empleados de la fabrica.
					
					Le acompanaron Hwang Pyong So, Han Kwang Sang, Hong Yong Chil y Kim Jong Gwan.

articles.title: Iniciada Competencia Internacional de Lucha Profesional de Pyongyang
articles.content:
Iniciada Competencia Internacional de Lucha Profesional de Pyongyang
Pyongyang, 30 de agosto (ACNC) -- Quedo iniciada el dia 30 en el Coliseo Deportivo Jong Ju Yong de Ryugyong la Competencia Internacional de Lucha Profesional de Pyongyang bajo el ideal "Para la paz, para la amistad".
					Participaron el ministro de Deportes Kim Yong Hun, los copresidentes del comite organizador de la Competencia Internacional de Lucha Profesional de Pyongyang: el director jefe de la Asociacion de Comunidad de Deportes y Paz de Japon, Kanji Inoki, y el presidente del Comite Internacional de Juegos de Artes Marciales, Jang Ung, el presidente de la Asociacion de Amistad Corea-Japon, Pak Kun Gwang, y el miembro ejecutivo del Comite Internacional de Juegos de Artes Marciales, Kim Myong Chol, los trabajadores, jovenes y estudiantes en la capital, los matrimonios de los representantes diplomaticos de varios paises y de organizaciones internacionales, acreditados en Corea, huespedes extranjeros y compatriotas en ultramar. 
					
					La ceremonia de apertura se inicio con una funcion artistica peculiar. 
					
					Entraron alli los jugadores a ser participados en la competencia. 
					
					Ante todo, hizo uso de la palabra Kanji Inoki, quien subrayo:
					
					  Pienso alegre que la presente visita a Corea es la trigesima cuya primera fue realizada en 1994 por motivo de la relacion con mi maestro Rikidozan (Kim Sin Rak).
					
					El intercambio entre los paises se inicia y se desarrolla a traves del intercambio de deporte, cultura y otras esferas.
					
					Espero que mediante la presente competencia internacional se abra la puerta de las relaciones Japon-Corea, cerrada durante largo tiempo, y los dos paises no se haran los "vecinos lejos" sino los "vecinos intimos".
					
					Le siguio en usar la palabra Jang Ung. 
					
					El dio calurosa bienvenida a los luchadores profesionales de varios paises del mundo y los amigos extranjeros que vinieron a Corea para tomar parte en la Competencia Internacional de Lucha Profesional de Pyongyang atravesando oceanos y continentes.
					
					Apunto que en el futuro tambien el pueblo coreano hara ingentes esfuerzos por fortalecer la cooperacion y la solidaridad internacionales en diversas esferas incluso el intercambio de deportivo bajo el ideal de la independencia, la paz y la amistad. 
					
					Expreso la conviccion de que todos los jugadores manifestaran sin reservas sus habilidades dando alegria a los espectadores y glorificaran con letra mayuscula la presente competencia como foro especial en la historia del torneo de lucha profesional del mundo.

articles.title: Primera jornada de Competencia Internacional de Lucha Profesional de Pyongyang
articles.content:
Primera jornada de Competencia Internacional de Lucha Profesional de Pyongyang 
Pyongyang, 30 de agosto (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 30 en el Coliseo Deportivo Jong Ju Yong de Ryugyong la primera jornada de la Competencia Internacional de Lucha Profesional de Pyongyang. 
					En la presente cita los jugadores de fama mundial competiran por la victoria en los enfrentamientos simples masculinos y los dobles de ambos sexos. 
					
					La vieron los trabajadores, jovenes y estudiantes capitalinos, los aficionados, huespedes extranjeros y compatriotas quienes vinieron aqui para ver la competencia de los renombradotes luchadores del mundo. 
					
					Los luchadores profesionales dieron ataque fuerte desde el principio para tomar la iniciativa. 
					
					Con elevado espiritu y gran paciencia combinaron bien su fuerza explosiva con sus habilidades. 
					
					En la hora de descanso, se ofrecio la presentacion modelo de los jugadores japoneses de arte marcial y los taekwondocas coreanos. 
					
					El resultado de la primera jornada va como sigue: 
					
					Vencidos: derrotados en simple masculino: 
					
					Crusher Kawaguchi (Japon): Taichi Hashimoto (Japon)
					
					  Wang Bin (China): Keisuke Okuda (Japon) 
					
					Ultimo Tragon (Japon): Hajime Ohara (Japon) Montanha Silva (Brasil): Taka Kunoh (Japon) Jerome Le Banner (Francia): Shinichi Suzukawa (Japon) 
					
					Kazuyuki Fujita (Japon): Erik Hammer (Estados Unidos) 
					
					
					
					Vencidos: Derrotados en doble masculino:
					
					Bob Sapp, Jon Andersen (Estados Unidos): Atsushi Sawada, Shogun Okamoto (Japon) 
						
					
					Vencidos: Derrotados en doble femenino:
					
					Ray, Kyoko Kimura (Japon): Meiko Satomura, Dash Chisako (Japon) 
					
					La competencia continua.
